title: 400+ Best Instagram Bio Ideas for Boys (Plus Tips to Get More Followers)

steps.title: Come up with a cool and mysterious bio to stand out from the crowd.
steps.content: Come up with a cool and mysterious bio to stand out from the crowd. If you’re not the type to take Instagram too seriously, these low-key bios are calling your name! They don’t reveal much about your personality or content, encouraging people to check out your posts: Just vibes. Welcome back. How’s the view? Living life with no limits. Be a voice, not an echo. Work hard, party harder. Respect the unexpected. A shadow with a purpose. Take risks, make memories. Learning, growing, evolving. Not lost, just taking my time. Taking the road less traveled. I don’t need to be seen to be felt. Living vicariously through myself. I’m the puzzle you’ll never complete. Here’s my story for the history books. Keeping it real since (your birth year). My silence speaks louder than words. The best stories are the ones left untold. Cooler than the other side of your pillow. I live in the moments you won’t remember.

steps.title: Express your passion for fashion with a stylish bio.
steps.content: Express your passion for fashion with a stylish bio. Is your profile full of thrift flips, sneaker shots, or #OOTD videos? Come up with a bio that highlights your style philosophy and passion for fashion. Here are some creative ideas to help you get started: Setting my own trends. Stay sharp, stay stylish. The world is my runway. Attitude is my accessory. Fashion-forward, always. My style is my superpower. Not just a look, it’s a lifestyle. Fashion fades, style is eternal. Fashion is my second language. My favorite F-word is Ferragamo. Clothes speak louder than words. Confidence is the best accessory. Dress like you’re already the boss. A man of style, elegance, and taste. Life’s too short to wear boring clothes. Dress how you want to be addressed 🎩 Fashion is my armor, style is my weapon. Style isn’t what you wear, it’s how you wear it. Dressed to impress, but my vibe does the rest. Style is my language, confidence is my accent.

steps.title: Drop a confident bio to show everyone you’re the best.
steps.content: Drop a confident bio to show everyone you’re the best. Trying to remind your followers who’s the boss? Highlight what makes you special with a cool (and slightly cocky) bio. Here are some of the best options to draw attention to your appearance, intelligence, drive, or whatever helps you dominate the day: Hero of my own world. Mediocrity isn’t my style. The topic and the top pick. Success is my favorite flex. I don’t compete, I dominate. Legends don’t chase trends. Don’t be a copy, be an original. They told me I couldn’t. So I did. I don’t follow rules, I make them. Setting trends, not following them. I don’t do average, I do greatness. Breaking norms with every step I take. Paving my own path, no detours allowed. I’m not here to fit in, I’m here to stand out. I am who I am, your approval isn’t needed. I don’t chase dreams, I make them a reality. All my markers dried out ‘cause I never cap. Silence is my weapon, success is my revenge. Don’t raise your voice. Improve your argument. Not everyone likes me but not everyone matters. Don’t regret the opportunities you were too afraid to take.

steps.title: Show off your desire for the finer things in life with a VIP bio.
steps.content: Show off your desire for the finer things in life with a VIP bio. If you’re a fan of caviar, champagne, luxury cars, watches, and living the high life, there’s definitely an Instagram bio to match your vibe. Here are some luxurious bios to indicate you’ve got expensive taste: Life’s finest. Always on top. Mr. Worldwide 💎 VIP of my own story. Luxury is my lifestyle. Legend in the making. Living life in the fast lane. All access, no limits 🔑🌃 High profile, high standards. Access granted: VIP edition. Adventure, style, and VIP vibes. Making each day a masterpiece. VIP status: Only the finest will do. Turning visions into VIP ventures. The premium experience starts now. First-class energy, top tier results 🛫 Rolls Royce attitude, no brakes 🏎️💨 Life’s a VIP experience and I’m the star. Operating at a level they can’t reach 📈 Elevating ordinary moments to VIP status. Embracing life’s adventures with class and style.

steps.title: Keep your bio short and simple to capture everyone’s attention.
steps.content: Keep your bio short and simple to capture everyone’s attention. Photos can speak louder than words, and if you’ve posted a lot of content, you don’t need to say much to shine. Stick to a short phrase in your bio to encourage people to scroll down your page: Just vibing 🌊 Stay curious 🌌 Simplicity is key. Chasing dreams. Keeping it real 🤙 Be true to you 💯 Go with the flow 🌀 Good vibes only ☀️ Enjoying the journey. Smiling through it all. Here for a good time. Living in the moment. Family, friends, and fun. Focused and grateful 🙏 Life’s what you make it 📖 Living easy, dreaming big 💫 Enjoying the little things in life. Taking life one day at a time 🕰️ Making the most of every moment. Peace, love, and positivity ✌️💙✨

steps.title: Write a witty bio to show off your sense of humor.
steps.content: Write a witty bio to show off your sense of humor. Instagram bios are the perfect place to showcase your personality and let others know you don’t take yourself too seriously. If you want to make everyone laugh out loud, reference an iconic meme or use a funny one-liner: Hey, stalkers. Bad and boozy. Occasional adult. Hacked at 1 billion. Yeah, I got nothing 🤷 DM for disappointments. Shrek is love, Shrek is life. PhD in Rizzology 👨‍🎓📚🪄 Reality called so I hung up. Humble with a hint of Kanye. Fall seven times, stand up late. Taking life one meme at a time. Minor inconvenience to society. If I left you on read, here’s why… Fear the beard, embrace the weird. Recommended by 4 out of 5 friends. A time capsule of my poor decisions. CEO of laughing at inappropriate times. The reason the group chat is muted 🤫 Mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell. Genius. Billionaire. Playboy. Philanthropist. Fluent in sarcasm, swear words, and song lyrics. ⚠️ Caution: Posts may be highly cringey. Follow at your own risk. ⚠️

steps.title: Include a positive quote in your bio to inspire others.
steps.content: Include a positive quote in your bio to inspire others. Searching for an uplifting bio to stand out from the crowd? Drop some words of wisdom to add substance to your profile. An inspiring message is one of the best ways to get noticed and make a positive impact online! Seek discomfort. Live more, worry less. Great things take time. Dream big, hustle hard. Work hard, stay humble. Never stop, never settle. Don’t be bitter, be better. Believe. Achieve. Repeat. Be a warrior, not a worrier. Dream big and dare to fall. Fueled by coffee and ambition. Find the magic in each moment. Less perfection, more authenticity. Grow through what you go through. Turning obstacles into opportunities. Positivity, persistence, and progress. Life’s a climb, but the view is worth it. Success isn’t a destination—it’s a journey. The only limit is the one you set for yourself. Every day is an opportunity to rewrite your story.

steps.title: Showcase your skills and achievements with a career-based bio.
steps.content: Showcase your skills and achievements with a career-based bio. If your profession is a major part of your personality, feel free to highlight your credentials, career goals, or work ethic in your bio. It’s a great way to establish credibility online and potentially connect with people in your industry! Locked in 🎯🔐 Pursuing excellence. Chasing goals, not fame. Innovator. Leader. Creator. Turning concepts into realities. Focused on the bigger picture 🔭 Entrepreneur • Speaker • Believer Photographer | Life behind the lens Focused, driven, and always evolving. Building a legacy, one day at a time ✨ Pushing boundaries and breaking limits. Creating opportunities > waiting for them Architect of ideas, builder of dreams 🛠️💡 Driven by passion, focused on results 🧠🚀 Strategist by profession, visionary by nature. Risk taker. Problem solver. Visionary thinker. Data analyst by day, wine connoisseur by night. Building connections, creating opportunities 🤝💼 Elevating the game and empowering communities. Dedicated to progress, passionate about innovation 🌱📈

steps.title: Emphasize your desire to explore with a travel-inspired bio.
steps.content: Emphasize your desire to explore with a travel-inspired bio. Do you love traveling to different countries and immersing yourself in new cultures? Use any of the following bios to reveal your current location, dream destination, or appetite for adventure: Adventure awaits. 📍Currently in Tokyo Living life on the map 🗺 Lost in the right direction. We off the grid, grid, grid. Your favorite travel guide. Meet me in the woods 🌲 I can show you the world… Wonder less, wander more. Catch flights, not feelings ✈️ Always take the scenic route. Adventure is my compass 🧭 Capturing nature’s beauty 📸 Collecting shells and stories 🐚 Chasing sunsets, not deadlines. Jetting off to new adventures 🚀 Travel far enough to meet yourself. Plane tickets are my love language. Just a nomad exploring the world 🌐 Life is short and the world is wide 🌎 Where the WiFi is weak, but the views are strong.

steps.title: Come up with a trendy bio about swag to show off your personality.
steps.content: Come up with a trendy bio about swag to show off your personality. Swag refers to stylish confidence in slang. [1] X Research source So, if you’re the freshest person in your friend group, let all your followers know! Here are the best swag-related bios to make everyone smile: Just pure swag. Fueled by swag. Pretty boy swag. Swag is in my DNA. Swag level: Legendary Swag is my middle name. My swag speaks for itself. Woke up and chose swag. I don’t do basic, I do swag. Got swag, no need to brag. Swag is my signature move. Swag on high, haters on low. Walk, talk, and breathe swag. Too much swag to be humble. Simplicity with a dash of swag. Too much swag to be overlooked. Swag so smooth, it’s untouchable. ‼️ under the influence of swag ‼️ Swag so sharp, it cuts through the crowd. I didn’t choose the swag life, the swag life chose me.

steps.title: Choose a regal and bold bio to hype yourself up.
steps.content: Choose a regal and bold bio to hype yourself up. If you want to show off your sophistication and natural sense of leadership, incorporate an authoritative and uplifting tone in your bio. Here are the best bios to let everyone know that you’re a king: Born to rule. King of the world. Leader of the pack. A king in the making. Ruling my own realm. Destined for greatness. Royalty runs in my blood. Crowned with confidence. Royal blood, humble heart. This is a peasant-free zone. Ruling my destiny with grace. In a world of commoners, be regal. A king builds his empire, not excuses. Embracing the majestic journey of life. In my kingdom, coffee is the crown jewel. Leading with strength, reigning with style. I don’t need a crown to prove I’m the king. A king’s silence speaks louder than words. Loyal to my principles, royal in my attitude. Grace in every step, royalty in every breath.

steps.title: Highlight your passion with a sport- or fitness-related bio.
steps.content: Highlight your passion with a sport- or fitness-related bio. Whether you want to motivate others, promote your personal training program, or show off your team workout, these sports and fitness-focused bios are perfect for any athlete or gym rat: Health is wealth. No pain, no gain. Rise and grind 💪 Eat. Gym. Repeat. Pushing limits daily. Nothing but gains 📈 Progress > perfection Weights before dates. Sweat now, shine later. No excuses, just results. Speed is my second name. Sore today. Strong tomorrow. Athlete by day, legend by night. Born to compete, built to win 🏅 Success starts with a single step. Strength comes from struggle 🏋️ Train insane or remain the same 🏃‍♂️ Shooting for greatness every day 🏀 Today’s struggles are tomorrow’s victories. The body achieves what the mind believes 🧠

steps.title: Opt for a two-lined bio to make a bold statement.
steps.content: Opt for a two-lined bio to make a bold statement. If you want to deviate from the norm, dedicate two whole lines for your bio. It’s a great way to express yourself and create a unique aesthetic on your profile. Just follow these easy steps to get multiple lines in your Instagram bio. Work hard Play hard. Good food Good mood. You matter Don’t give up. Do it Nothing is impossible. When in doubt Dance it out. Life’s a journey Enjoy the ride. Dream chaser Memory maker. Thrill seeker Living the adventure. Embrace imperfections Love always. Seeds of compassion Rain kindness. Exploring the world One city at a time. Every day is a fresh start Make it count. Forging my path Writing my own destiny. Positivity is my motto Smiling through life. Don’t just go through life Grow through life. Be yourself Everyone else is already taken. Living for the moment Loving every second. Living my best life Capturing every moment. Creating my dream reality Chapter by chapter. The quieter you become The more you can hear. When life knocks you down Roll over and look at the stars. We don’t stop dancing when we get old We get old when we stop dancing.

steps.title: Choose a word that captures your personality for a standout bio.
steps.content: Choose a word that captures your personality for a standout bio. A one-word bio is cool, refreshing, and aesthetically pleasing, making it a great option if you want a quick bio. Simply pick an adjective, title, or occupation that fits your interests or lifestyle, then let your profile do the rest. Here are some of our favorites: Artist. Rebel. Gamer. Foodie. Creator. Athlete. Warrior. Leader. Nomad. Optimist. Explorer. Maverick. Innovator. Visionary. Fearless. Survivor. Gladiator. Resilient. Voyager. Achiever. Rockstar. Ambitious. Champion. Gentleman. Unbothered. Adventurous.

steps.title: Sprinkle in some emojis to spice up a standard bio.
steps.content: Sprinkle in some emojis to spice up a standard bio. If you want to add a splash of color to your bio, play around with different emoji combinations. Whether you go for a sporty, beachy, or seasonal theme, try to pick emojis that showcase your interests and match the aesthetic of your profile: 🏎️💨🍃 🍺🏈🇺🇸 🎲🍀🎰 ‧₊˚🏀彡ִ ࣪𖤐 🏋🏽🔥💪🏼🎧 🧗🎒🏕️📸 🎮 = my 🌎 NYC 🍎🏙🚕 🌊🏄🌴🐬☀️ 🔭🌌🪐✨🧑‍🚀 ☃️🥶❄️🛷🌨️ Taken 🔐🖇❤️‍ ✌️, ❤️, and 🍕 Sunset chaser 🌇 (Your ethnicity) 🇧🇷🇺🇸 Party animal 🪩🕺💫 Music is my life 🤟🎸🎵 My life is a movie 🍿🎥 🎞 Float like a 🦋 sting like a 🐝 Karate Instructor 🥋 Book Lover 📖 Wine Connoisseur 🍷

steps.title: Add Kawaii-inspired emoticons for a unique and creative bio.
steps.content: Add Kawaii-inspired emoticons for a unique and creative bio. Don’t want to mess around with tons of text? Throw out a Japanese emoticon to showcase your mood and create a cool aesthetic! You can combine it with a short quote or use it alone to match the vibe of your profile: ᶻ 𝗓 𐰁 .ᐟ (⌐▀͡ ̯ʖ▀) ᕙ(‾̀◡‾́)ᕗ ♪┌|∵|┘♪ ᕦ⊙෴⊙ᕤ ( ꩜ ᯅ ꩜;)⁭ ⁭ ☆ ★ ✮ ★ ☆ ⋆꙳•̩̩͙❅*̩̩͙‧͙ ‧͙*̩̩͙❆ ͙͛ ˚₊⋆ ꒷꒦꒷꒦꒷꒦꒷꒦꒷꒦꒷ 「 ✦ 𝐍𝐚𝐦𝐞 ✦ 」 ⊹ ࣪ ﹏𓊝﹏𓂁﹏⊹ ࣪ ˖ 𓆝 𓆟 𓆞 𓆝 𓆟 𖠰𐂂𖣂𖢔𖠋𓍄𓇥𓋜𓐬 ⫘⫘⫘⫘⫘⫘⫘⫘⫘⫘ ♫♪.ılılıll|̲̅̅●̲̅̅|̲̅̅=̲̅̅|̲̅̅●̲̅̅|llılılı.♫♪ ♈︎ ♌︎ ♐︎ ♉︎ ♍︎ ♑︎ ♊︎ ♎︎ ♒︎ ♋︎ ♏︎ ♓︎ ┈┈┈┈․° ☣ °․┈┈┈┈ ͙⁺˚*•̩̩͙✩•̩̩͙*˚⁺‧͙⁺˚*•̩̩͙✩•̩̩͙*˚⁺‧͙⁺˚*•̩̩͙✩•̩̩͙*˚⁺‧͙ Foodie | ‧₊˚ ⋅(๑ᵔ⤙ᵔ๑) 𓐐𓎩 ‧₊˚ ⋅ Loading bio: [■■■■■■■■■□] 90% ♫⋆｡♪ ₊˚♬ ﾟ.♫⋆｡ ♪ ₊˚♬ ﾟ.♫⋆｡ ♪ ₊˚♬ ﾟ. ᯓ★ (name, quote, or zodiac sign) ★彡 » [song name - artist] « ▶• ılıılıılıılıılıılı (♫) ✦(Name) ✦(School Year) ✦(Relationship Status)

steps.title: Use a stylish font to elevate your Instagram bio.
steps.content: Use a stylish font to elevate your Instagram bio. Using a cool font is an easy way to jazz up your profile and catch everyone’s attention. Just type your bio into a font generator , then copy and paste the text in your bio. t̾o̾o̾ ̾r̾a̾d̾ ̾t̾o̾ ̾b̾e̾ ̾s̾a̾d̾ gₒₒd ᵥᵢbₑₛ gᵤₐᵣₐₙₜₑₑd ₥₳₴₮ɆⱤ ₦₳₱₱ɆⱤ 𝙮𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙢𝙤𝙢 𝙨𝙖𝙮𝙨 𝙝𝙞 😏 ʂυƈƈҽʂʂ ιʂ ιɳ ɱყ ʋҽιɳʂ. ᔕᑕᖇOᒪᒪ ᖴOᖇ ᑕᕼᗩOᔕ ˙ǝɯ ʎllɐnʇɔɐ ʇ,usı sıɥʇ 'oN 𝕥𝕙𝕖 𝕓𝕖𝕤𝕥 𝕡𝕝𝕒𝕔𝕖 𝕥𝕠 𝕕𝕠𝕦𝕓𝕝𝕖 𝕥𝕒𝕡. ˜”*°•.˜”*°• 𝘺𝘢 𝘭𝘪𝘬𝘦 𝘫𝘢𝘻𝘻? •°*”˜.•°*”˜ D̳̳r̳̳e̳̳a̳̳m̳̳s̳ ̳d̳̳o̳̳n̳'̳t̳ ̳w̳̳o̳̳r̳̳k̳ ̳u̳̳n̳̳l̳̳e̳̳s̳̳s̳ ̳y̳̳o̳̳u̳ ̳d̳̳o̳. ｅｓｔａｂｌｉｓｈｅｄ ｉｎ ２００４ 𝖍𝖊𝖗𝖊 𝖋𝖔𝖗 𝖆 𝖌𝖔𝖔𝖉 𝖙𝖎𝖒𝖊, 𝖓𝖔𝖙 𝖆 𝖑𝖔𝖓𝖌 𝖙𝖎𝖒𝖊. 𝙻𝚒𝚏𝚎’𝚜 𝚜𝚑𝚘𝚛𝚝, 𝚖𝚊𝚔𝚎 𝚎𝚟𝚎𝚛𝚢 𝚙𝚘𝚜𝚝 𝚌𝚘𝚞𝚗𝚝 ⏳ 𝒟𝑜𝓃'𝓉 𝓈𝓉𝓊𝒹𝓎 𝓂𝑒, 𝓎𝑜𝓊 𝓌𝑜𝓃'𝓉 𝑔𝓇𝒶𝒹𝓊𝒶𝓉𝑒 📚 𝓔𝓪𝓽 🍽️ 𝓢𝓵𝓮𝓮𝓹 💤 𝓒𝓻𝓮𝓪𝓽𝓮 🤳🏼 𝓡𝓮𝓹𝓮𝓪𝓽 🔁 𝚝𝚑𝚎 𝚋𝚛𝚘 𝚢𝚘𝚞'𝚍 𝚋𝚛𝚒𝚗𝚐 𝚑𝚘𝚖𝚎 𝚝𝚘 𝚖𝚎𝚎𝚝 𝚢𝚘𝚞𝚛 𝚜𝚚𝚞𝚊𝚍. ▂▃▅▇█▓▒░𝚗𝚎𝚠 𝚢𝚘𝚛𝚔 𝚘𝚛 𝚗𝚘𝚠𝚑𝚎𝚛𝚎░▒▓█▇▅▃▂ 🆃🆁🅴🅰🆃 🅿🅴🅾🅿🅻🅴 🆆🅸🆃🅷 🅺🅸🅽🅳🅽🅴🆂🆂. 【﻿ｓａｒｃａｓｍ ｉｓ ｍｙ ｓｕｐｅｒｐｏｗｅｒ】 Ⓦⓗⓔⓝ ⓝⓞⓣⓗⓘⓝⓖ ⓖⓞⓔⓢ ⓡⓘⓖⓗⓣ, ⓖⓞ ⓛⓔⓕⓣ. ≋m≋a≋k≋i≋n≋g≋ ≋w≋a≋v≋e≋s≋ ≋a≋n≋d≋ ≋r≋i≋d≋i≋n≋g≋ ≋t≋h≋e≋ ≋t≋i≋d≋e≋

steps.title: Drop your favorite song lyric for a short and simple bio.
steps.content: Drop your favorite song lyric for a short and simple bio. If you’re at a loss for words, this is the easiest way to create your own bio. Pull up your playlist to see what songs you’ve been playing on repeat, or use a line from any of the following songs: “Guts over fear.” —Eminem, “Guts Over Fear” “Sit down, be humble.” —Kendrick Lamar, “HUMBLE.” “Everything starts from something.” —Justin Bieber, “Believe” “Against the odds, I’d bet on myself.” —Travis Scott, “SKITZO” “The headliner, finisher, I’m the closer, winner.” —Usher, “More” “I’m the son of rage and love.” —Green Day, “Jesus of Suburbia” “Always stay humble and kind.” —Tim McGraw, “Humble and Kind” “I sell the fact that I can’t be bought.” —Arctic Monkeys, “Batphone” “Real G’s move in silence like lasagna.” —Lil Wayne, “6 Foot 7 Foot” “I been flexin’ all my life, you can’t finesse me.” —Future, “Touch the Sky” “Everything I’m not made me everything I am.” —Kanye, “Everything I Am” “This slang that I speak don’t change that I’m deep.” —J. Cole, “Can I Live” “The love you take is equal to the love you make.” —The Beatles, “The End” “Love can change the world in a moment.” —Ed Sheeran, “What Do I Know?” “I’m just tryna live life through a new lens.” —The Weeknd, “Tell Your Friends” “Don’t try to act like someone else, be yourself.” —Frank Ocean, “Be Yourself” “I’m on the pursuit of happiness.” —Kid Cudi, “Pursuit of Happiness (Nightmare)” “I’ll make it to the moon if I have to crawl.” —Red Hot Chili Peppers, “Scar Tissue” “I am an ocean, I am the sea. There is a world inside of me.” —Bring Me the Horizon, “Crucify Me” “I believe there’s a god above me. I’m just the god of everything else.” —Pusha T, “New God Flow” “Me and my money attached emotionally.” —JID (ft. 21 Savage & Baby Tate), “Surround Sound”

steps.title: Get help from someone else if you’re struggling to craft a bio.
steps.content: Get help from someone else if you’re struggling to craft a bio. Choose an author, celebrity, or any other public figure you admire, and share their words for a quick bio. Here are some funny, reflective, and inspirational options: “Stay hungry. Stay foolish.” —Steve Jobs “Your only limit is your mind.” —Michael Phelps “Happiness depends upon ourselves.” —Aristotle “You become what you believe.” —Oprah Winfrey “When in doubt, look intelligent.” —Garrison Keillor “If you don’t play to win, don’t play at all.” —Tom Brady “There is peace even in the storm.” —Vincent van Gogh “Whatever you do, do it to the extreme.” —Jason Statham “I’ve learned that I still have a lot to learn.” —Maya Angelou “Talent without working hard is nothing.” —Cristiano Ronaldo “Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.” —Confucius “You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.” —Wayne Gretzky “It’s okay to live a life others don’t understand.” —Jenna Woginrich “Believe you can, and you’re halfway there.” —Theodore Roosevelt “Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.” —Albert Einstein “What matters most is how well you walk through the fire.” —Charles Bukowski “It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.” —E.E. Cummings “Never apologize for what you feel. It’s like saying sorry for being real.” —Lil Wayne “You can overcome anything, if and only if you love something enough.” —Lionel Messi “You have to expect great things of yourself before you can do them.” —Michael Jordan

steps.title: Be concise and showcase your unique personality.
steps.content: Be concise and showcase your unique personality. Think of your bio as a digital handshake, or your first impression online. It tells other people who you are and what type of content you’re creating, plus reveals your interests and personality. According to Bachelor, you should add “a short description about who you are as a person” in your Instagram bio. That way, you can show off your personality and connect with other like-minded people. Add a link in your bio: Bachelor recommends using a third-party service like LinkTree to connect “your website, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and other social media platforms.” Include your contact information: Bachelor says you should also add information on “how to contact you” in your bio, especially if you’re a blogger, influencer, comedian, or other business page. How to edit your IG bio: Open the app and click on the round button at the bottom right-hand corner of your screen to access your profile. Click “Edit profile” underneath your profile photo, then click on the text box next to “Bio.” Input a bio and hit “Submit” to save your changes. [2] X Research source

Create a unique Instagram handle. Your Instagram username needs to fit your unique vibe and flair. Whether it's a personal account or a business account, you need to attract your audience, make an impression, and tell them exactly what to expect from you. Describe your account, and we'll find the perfect username just for you.
